trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Apache Junction
There were no other sightings in Apache Junction on or around February 6th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving East bound on highway 60 in Mesa spotted dark cloud over the Superstition Mountains. Dark cloud had a dome top and flat bottom and was giant in size compared to mountain. Dark cloud did not match any clouds in the area. My passenger noticed it 1st and told me about it I was driving. As soon as myself and passenger started looking at the object it flattened out and disappeared about 1 minute of action.
